channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 美国军方称，也门胡蒂叛军发射的一枚导弹周三击中了亚丁湾的一艘散货船，船员报告称有三人死亡，至少四人受伤。
item.description:
A missile fired by Yemen's Huthi rebels hit a bulk carrier in the Gulf of Aden on Wednesday, with the crew reporting three people killed and at least four wounded, the US military sayshttps://t.co/tbZ3RjDMHi pic.twitter.com/5FCWpw8S9w

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 中国称加沙战争是 "文明的耻辱"。随着冲突进入第六个月，北京敦促立即停火。 美国总统拜登敦促哈马斯在斋月开始前接受与以色列的停火计划
item.description:
China calls the war in Gaza a "disgrace to civilisation".

Beijing urges an immediate ceasefire as the conflict stretches into its sixth month. US President Biden has urged Hamas to accept a ceasefire plan with Israel before the start of Ramadanhttps://t.co/1pXLHEloYc pic.twitter.com/p6ASpFfim9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 能剧是日本现存最古老的戏剧形式之一，可追溯到八世纪，一个多世纪以来，能剧一直向男女演员开放，但在传统艺术领域，女性仍是稀缺人才。
item.description:
Women break into Japan's 'masculine' Noh theatre.

One of the oldest surviving forms of theatre dating back to the eighth century, Noh has been open to performers of both genders for over a century but women are still a rarity in the traditional arthttps://t.co/Rk96Oer94n pic.twitter.com/csecHNEvXE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 这些被称为 "欧洲菜园 "的塑料大棚覆盖着农田，估计占地 4 万公顷，生产数百万吨水果和蔬菜。
item.description:
'Sea of plastic'.@AFP’s Oscar Del Pozo photographs greenhouses in El Ejido, Almeria, southern Spain.

The greenhouses - plastic covered farmland dubbed "Europe's vegetable garden" - cover an estimated 40,000 hectares and produce millions of tons of fruit and vegetables pic.twitter.com/Z2woIgGAuI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 不仅仅是人类。两项研究显示，蜜蜂和黑猩猩可以从同伴那里学习复杂到它们自己永远无法掌握的技能，这种能力以前被认为是人类独有的。
item.description:
Not just humans.

Bees and chimps can learn skills from their peers so complicated that they could never have mastered them on their own, an ability previously thought to be unique to humans, two studies showhttps://t.co/FVlaEbKxyP pic.twitter.com/n5VDLBKog7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #周四，中国外交部长王毅在一次范围广泛的新闻发布会上抨击美国，赞扬中国与俄罗斯的伙伴关系，并称加沙战争是 "文明的耻辱"：
item.description:
#UPDATE China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi lashed out against the United States and praised his country's partnership with Russia on Thursday, in a wide-ranging press conference where he called the war in Gaza a "disgrace for civilisation"

Full story: https://t.co/n1ejK8VUSw pic.twitter.com/YVNblzUOVb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 25 岁的莉扎（Liza，仅知道她的名字）死后，抗议者在华沙举行集会，反对性暴力。
item.description:
Rape and killing of Belarusian immigrant sends shockwaves through Belarus exiles in Poland.

Protesters rallied in Warsaw against sexual violence after the death of 25-year-old Liza (only identified by her first name)https://t.co/aCO1seTKtQ pic.twitter.com/ZA91yGcOJv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #欧洲气候监测机构称，上个月是有记录以来全球最热的二月，全球气温连续第九个月创历史新高，气候变化正将世界带入 "未知领域
item.description:
#UPDATE Last month was the warmest February on record globally, the ninth straight month of historic high temperatures across the planet as climate change steers the world into "uncharted territory", Europe's climate monitor sayshttps://t.co/FLCyHZFt1E pic.twitter.com/Lrli2ffUXI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 中国外交部长称加沙战争是 "文明的耻辱 "#BREAKING
item.description:
#BREAKING China FM calls war in Gaza a 'disgrace for civilisation' pic.twitter.com/4klHdHUzqy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #欧洲气候监测机构周四表示，上个月是全球有记录以来最温暖的二月，这是全球连续第九个月出现历史最高气温，海面温度也创下了新的记录。
item.description:
#BREAKING Last month was the warmest February on record globally.

It was the ninth straight month of historic high temperatures across the planet, Europe's climate monitor said Thursday, as sea surface temperatures also hit a new record pic.twitter.com/XWW7biGqdk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #中国外交部长警告寻求独立的台湾人民将遭到 "历史的清算
item.description:
#BREAKING China's foreign minister warns Taiwanese people seeking independence will be 'liquidated by history' pic.twitter.com/20Qq1IdXSA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 纳达尔退出了ATP-WTA印第安维尔斯大师赛，在揭幕战前夕放弃了伤愈复出。"我一直在努力工作......但我觉得自己还没有准备好在如此重要的赛事中打出最高水平，"纳达尔在一份声明中说。
item.description:
#UPDATE Rafael Nadal has withdrawn from the ATP-WTA Indian Wells Masters, abandoning his comeback from injury on the eve of his opening match.

"I have been working hard ... but I don't find myself ready to play at the highest level at such an important event," Nadal said in a… pic.twitter.com/rJHbm2iVcJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING 拉斐尔-纳达尔退出 ATP 印第安维尔斯站复赛 #BREAKING 拉斐尔-纳达尔退出 ATP 印第安维尔斯站复赛
item.description:
#BREAKING Rafael Nadal withdraws from ATP Indian Wells comeback pic.twitter.com/sgaM9oAxVW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 第一位从美国国家航空航天局（NASA）培训中毕业的阿拉伯女性向月球开枪埃米尔人诺拉-阿尔马特罗希（Nora AlMatrooshi）对太空的热爱源于一堂学校课，在这堂课上，她的老师模拟了一次月球之旅，并用手工制作了宇航服和火箭船帐篷。
item.description:
First Arab woman to graduate NASA training shoots for the Moon

Emirati Nora AlMatrooshi traces her love for space to an school lesson where her teacher simulated a trip to the Moon, complete with arts-and-crafts spacesuits and a tent for a rocket shiphttps://t.co/3kmkdyfiaT pic.twitter.com/ksAdMAdoJO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯对乌克兰港口城市敖德萨的致命导弹袭击似乎落在了沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基总统和来访的希腊总理的车队附近。
item.description:
A deadly Russian missile strike on the Ukrainian port city of Odesa appeared to land near the motorcade of President Volodymyr Zelensky and the visiting Greek prime minister, who described the "intense" moment of the surprise attack https://t.co/QPumUgrrSK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国军方称，也门胡蒂叛军发射的一枚导弹击中了亚丁湾的一艘散货船，船员报告称有三人死亡，至少四人受伤。
item.description:
A missile fired by Yemen's Huthi rebels hit a bulk carrier in the Gulf of Aden, with the crew reporting three people dead and at least four wounded, the US military said https://t.co/H8fOSVl8mE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #在亚历克-鲍德温（Alec Baldwin）的电影《锈》（Rust）拍摄现场，一名摄影师中枪身亡，而在片场负责看管武器的女摄影师被判犯有过失杀人罪。
item.description:
#UPDATE The woman in charge of weapons on the set of the Alec Baldwin movie "Rust," where a cinematographer was shot dead, was convicted of involuntary manslaughter https://t.co/sLchrU2MVg

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 成千上万的哥伦比亚人抗议古斯塔沃-彼得罗总统，抗议尽管他努力与武装团体进行和平谈判，但暴力事件仍继续困扰着这个南美国家。
item.description:
Thousands of Colombians protested against President Gustavo Petro and the violence that has continued to plague the South American country in spite of his efforts to negotiate peace with armed groups https://t.co/qN4p7YBdH0

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 塞内加尔周三晚些时候宣布了一系列消息，标志着总统选举推迟引发的数周危机出现了最新转折，塞内加尔选民最终将于 3 月底前往投票站投票。
item.description:
Senegalese voters should finally head to the polls at the end of March, following a string of announcements late Wednesday marking the latest twist in weeks of crisis triggered by the delay to the presidential election https://t.co/AOzaP1Fcnx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国司法部长梅里克-加兰（Merrick Garland）表示，一名中国软件工程师因涉嫌窃取谷歌人工智能技术而被捕，同时他还秘密为两家中国公司工作。
item.description:
A Chinese software engineer was arrested for allegedly stealing artificial intelligence technology from Google while secretly working for two Chinese companies, US Attorney General Merrick Garland said https://t.co/sBFPAq2chP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 根据判决，《锈迹斑斑》电影审判中的军械师被认定犯有过失杀人罪
item.description:
Armorer in 'Rust' movie trial found guilty of involuntary manslaughter, according to verdict pic.twitter.com/5TzdW2rKhE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 海地的吉米-"烧烤"-切里泽以革命者自居，很少在没有步枪和备用弹夹的情况下露面。
item.description:
Haiti's Jimmy "Barbecue" Cherizier presents himself as a revolutionary, and is seldom pictured without his rifle and spare clips of ammunition.

The former policeman heads one of the powerful gangs that is ravaging Haiti https://t.co/Qi5yfSWpLW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 🇺🇸 一份特别顾问报告引发了关于美国总统乔-拜登被认定为无受审能力的不实说法。专家称，只有法官才能做出这一认定。
item.description:
🇺🇸 A special counsel's report has inspired false claims that US President Joe Biden was found incompetent to stand trial.

Experts say only a judge can make that determination https://t.co/qn4sDK5Nru

— AFP Fact Check 🔎 (@AFPFactCheck) March 6, 2024

item.title: 当《芭比娃娃》获得包括最佳影片在内的八项奥斯卡奖提名时，今年奥斯卡颁奖晚会的组织团队就知道他们需要找谁了：瑞恩-高斯林 他将表演 "我只是肯"
item.description:
When "Barbie" was nominated for eight Academy Awards including best picture, the team organizing this year's Oscars gala knew exactly who they needed to approach: Ryan Gosling who will be performing "I'm Just Ken."https://t.co/2BhYF2nyiV

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 智利于 2022 年通过了一项法律，规定 "女性自杀 "为犯罪行为，即妇女因遭受性别暴力或被煽动自杀而导致死亡。
item.description:
The death of two women were triggers for a Chilean law passed in 2022 that created the crime of "femicidal suicide" -- when a woman takes her life as a result of being the victim of gender-based violence, or is incited to kill herself https://t.co/wCZ3FYkLlX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 哈拉-哈泽姆-哈马达（Hala Hazem Hamada），15 岁，在与以色列士兵发生致命交火后被困在瓦砾堆中，经过三天的磨难后获救。
item.description:
Hala Hazem Hamada, age 15, was rescued after a three-day ordeal trapped under rubble following a deadly encounter with Israeli soldiers that claimed the lives of six relatives including her parent https://t.co/PFvx2foUao

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 南非请求国际法院就以色列进攻加沙造成的 "大范围饥荒 "对以色列实施新的紧急措施
item.description:
South Africa petitioned the International Court of Justice to impose fresh emergency measures on Israel over what it described as the "widespread starvation" resulting from its Gaza offensive https://t.co/N8wt85j7hy pic.twitter.com/imm3ajGBy6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统在一次对高中生的演讲中表示，他认为堕胎是 "谋杀"，而堕胎在阿根廷是合法的。
item.description:
President Javier Milei said he considers abortion, which is legal in Argentina, to be "murder", in a speech to high school students https://t.co/SUv9ZlNZCX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 各候选人在共和党初选中获胜的州，包括 "超级星期二 "宣布的结果#AFPgraphics
item.description:
States won by each candidate in the Republican primaries, including declared results from Super Tuesday#AFPgraphics pic.twitter.com/KXCrjN6g9O

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司宣布将 3 月 14 日作为其巨型星际飞船火箭下一次试射的最早日期。
item.description:
Elon Musk's SpaceX announced it was eyeing March 14 as the earliest date for the next test launch of its giant Starship rocket, with which it hopes to one day colonize Mars https://t.co/QGs7XCERVc pic.twitter.com/xjERh5XaWz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024
